description:
Ok, so this Serviced thing is going to my head.
I thought the Adam 'Serviced' video was fun, but this video with Blair was full of surprises.
While filming these, I tend to get focused on the blow job, paying little attention to what the model is doing. Remember, I'm blowing a straight guy, and I am a bit preoccupied that their dick will go soft on me, so I'm workin' every trick in the book, basically trying to uh...blow these guys away, upholding our reputation that us gay guys give better head than the girls.
Yeah, I'm listening to them, but their facial expressions are a surprise when I go to edit the video.
I had no idea Blair was writhing around in ecstasy, and I knew he'd never had his ass eaten before, so the look on his face is priceless as he goes from giggling to intense pleasure.
And uh..his cumshot, well it rocks if I say so myself. Filming these are pretty awkward for me, but uh, well, this was pretty fun!
title: Blair & Bryan - Serviced
